fields.name: Add_this_Asset_to_the_Current_Work_Order
fields.fieldText: Add this Asset to the Current Work Order?

fields.name: Asset_Already_Associated
fields.fieldText: This asset is already associated with the Work Order Line Item {!varCurrentWOLI.LineItemNumber}

fields.name: textLocationDoesNotMatch
fields.fieldText: The location of the Asset does not match the location of the WO and cannot be added to the WO.

fields.name: WOLI_Created
fields.fieldText: The Asset with Digital Id ({!varAssetDigitalId}) has been associated with a Work Order Line Item on this Work Order ({!ObjWO.WorkOrderNumber}). Click 'Next' to finish.

variables.description: Determines if an Asset is a new Asset or not (if this flow is called by the Create new Asset flow, the asset is new and we do not need to loop over all WOLI items to check for an existing WOLI). Default value is false.
variables.name: BoolIsNewAsset

variables.description: The Id of the Work Order used to begin this flow
variables.name: Id
